Make sure you are casting Prayer of Mending in your Role for 2piece.

Make sure you got the improved Renew and/or Divine Aegis for 4piece.
If he indeed means Healadin, then yeah - there is still no modeling of the 2 and 4 set T9 bonus happening in 2.2.27 at this time.

These set bonuses are still missing regardless of whether you're alliance or horde. When can get see a fix for this?

Tier 9 2-piece added with commit 47236.  However, Infusion of Light's Flash of Light HoT for Sacred Shield does not appear to be modeled yet, so I need to model that before I implement the Tier 9 4-piece bonus.
